    • setPiece

      public void setPiece​(int row, int col, int player)
      Display the specified player icon on the specified slot
      Parameters:
      row - row of the slot
      col - column of the slot
      player - the player (number starting at 1) to be displayed

    • setNextPlayer

      public void setNextPlayer​(int player)
      Display the appropriate player icon under"Next Turn"
      Parameters:
      player - the player (number starting at 1) of the next player; its corresponding icon will be displayed under "Next Turn"
